backend/main.mo: Defines the game canister with room state, phases, players, chats, topics, guesses, and all core logic for creating/joining rooms and managing gameplay.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old room state to new state by adding the roundNumber field with a default value.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking product requirements to specific frontend files and components for validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files for documentation and build reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that routes between game screens based on session state and backend phase updates.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useCheckAndAd: React Query mutation hook that calls backend to advance the game phase and refreshes room state.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useCreateRoom: Mutation hook for creating a room, generating a code, updating session state, and handling success/error toasts.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useJoinRoom.t: Mutation hook for joining an existing room with error handling for missing, full, or invalid rooms.
Mutation hook that resets the room for a new round and refreshes room state.
Polling query hook fetching room state from the backend every two seconds.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useSendMessag: Provides a mutation to send a chat message and refresh room state on success, with error toasts.
Creates a mutation to start the game, handling host/size errors and invalidating room state.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useSubmitGues: Submits guess objects for selected players and refreshes room state afterward.
frontend/src/echoshift/api/useVoteForTop: Sends a topic vote mutation using the actor and refreshes room state.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/AppHea: Renders a page header showing title, optional subtitle, username badge, and room code.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatCo: Input form for typing and sending chat messages with basic validation.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ChatMe: Displays chat messages with auto-scroll and timestamp formatting, highlighting the current user.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/ErrorB: Shows a destructive alert banner with an error title and message.
frontend/src/echoshift/components/Screen: Provides a page layout with centered content and a footer linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/echoshift/hooks/useChatCoun: Computes remaining chat time based on room state start time and exposes formatted countdown info.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/playerId: Generates and persists a unique player ID in localStorage.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/useLocal: Ensures a local username exists by generating one and allows resetting it.
frontend/src/echoshift/identity/username: Generates adjective–animal usernames with numbers and validates their pattern.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GameChatS: Shows the chat phase UI with timer, topic, role info, message list, and composer, advancing phase when time expires.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/GuessingS: Displays the guessing phase where the Anchor selects players to mark as weird and submits guesses.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/HomeScree: Home screen letting users view/reset username, create a room, or join via code while ensuring a player ID exists.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/LobbyScre: Lobby showing players, host status, and start-game controls with validation for player count.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/ResultsSc: Results view calculating scores for Anchor and others, displaying outcomes and offering a play-again action.
frontend/src/echoshift/screens/TopicSele: Topic voting screen showing generated topics, vote counts, a countdown timer, and handling topic selection.
frontend/src/echoshift/state/session.ts: Zustand store managing session state such as player identity, room, host status, and current screen with persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity auth flow, stored identities, and login/logout state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App with global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors from CSS variables, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, feature requirements, and architectural notes for building the EchoShift MVP.
